tags: please won’t you be my neighbor?
summary: Quid pro NoNoNoYeeesss
body:
Quid pro NoNoNoYeeesss

So I need this story to be written

Extra smut please

Starting with neighbors trope… AU, modernish

Sandor moves to Sansa’s overly friendly cul-du-sac

Sansa presents neighborhood welcome basket which is accidentally, of course, probably on purpose, full of sexually suggestive items. Obviously put together by a romatically and otherwise scheming neighbor who wanted Sandor’s house for some borderline ridiculous circumventing of HOA rules

Sandor, understandably and adorably, confused and taken aback will then escalate the issue by giving Sansa a thank you gift of a subtly sexual nature as well

Poor horrified and baffled Sansa holds to rules of etiquette so tightly that she allows her propriety to be tossed and reciprocates in kind

After many many days of progressively more naughty one upmanship, the smutty smutty smut begins and repeats and repeats

I assume by the end, Sandor moves in with Sansa, Sandor’s house sold, babies are made and born, many dogs adopted, and the neighbor gets to add whatever ridiculous HOA violating thing started this all, maybe planting a lemon tree?

summary: You know, the very first time Jon was in *rage kitten mode/kill bill sirens* was during his first chapter in AGOT: “Sansa looked...
body:
You know, the very first time Jon was in *rage kitten mode/kill bill sirens* was during his first chapter in AGOT:

“Sansa looked radiant as she walked beside him, but Jon did not like Joffrey’s pouty lips or the bored, disdainful way he looked at Winterfell’s Great Hall”

—A Game of Thrones - Jon I 

After that he proceeded to get drunk

And after that he had something to say about Joffrey

I will never get over it!

—A Game of Thrones - Jon I 

After that he proceeded to get drunk

And after that he had something to say about Joffrey

I will never get over it!

summary: For story request Petyr x Alayne "What would you have me do, father?"
question: For story request Petyr x Alayne "What would you have me do, father?"
answer:
“Alayne?”

She turned around in the doorway to her bedchamber, looking over her shoulder with a shy smile.

“Yes, father?”

Petyr approached her. His tunic, made out of rich silk, swayed with each light step.

“Can we talk, my dear daughter?” He smiled back at her, though his smile didn’t reach his eyes. Most of the time she felt sorry for him. Sorry for the fact he couldn’t show his true feelings. He seemed to be incapable of heartfelt emotions. But then again, Alayne wasn’t much different. She should feel sorry for herself too.

“Of course”, she said and let him pass. She closed the door behind him, curious why he wanted to talk to her at such a late hour.

“I heard Harry and you are quite into each other.”

Alayne felt a blush creep to her cheeks.

“In order to make our plans reality, you need to bind him even more to you than he already is. Harry needs to fall deeply and madly in love with you.”

Ever the dutiful daughter, Alayne asked: “What would you have me do, father?”

Petyr’s mask slipped for half a heartbeat. At least this was what Alayne thought she felt and saw. After a blink, he was back normal.

“You need to bewitch him. With your words, with your looks. With your gestures. Like this.”

He stepped forward, took her hands into his and positioned them on his chest.

“Make him believe you can’t keep your hands to yourself”, he softly said. “Though without touching him full on. Make him want to desire more.”

Alayne looked up from her hands right into his eyes. It was like an overload of sensation. His heartbeat beneath her fingers, the silken material of his tunic, his dark green eyes and mischievous smirk.

“Make Harry dream of you, of your little touches and kisses.” Petyr leaned in even more, his breath tingling her cheek, her ear.

“Whisper sweet nothings into his ear before you lightly kiss him.” His lips wandered to hers, capturing her sweet mouth into a gentle kiss. All the while he held her hands on his chest, making her feel a familiar warmth spreading through her whole body.

He retreated slowly while looking into her eyes. Lastly he let go of her hands and stepped back again.

“Do you think you can do this, sweetling?”

Alayne nodded for the right words had left her mind completely.

“Good girl”, he whispered. He went to the door without looking back at her.

“Have a good night, my sweet little daughter.”

The heavy wooden door closed behind him and Alayne let out a deep breath she wasn’t even aware of holding in.

summary: 🔥 robb stark
question: 🔥 robb stark
answer: He should have done more to help Sansa. I mean he is capable of going against the wishes of his lords when his personal honor is involved (executing Karstark and marrying Jeyne) but when it comes to Sansa he won’t even lift a finger. Therefore Catelyn was right in releasing Jaime.

reblog.comment: He should have done more to help Sansa. I mean he is capable of going against the wishes of his lords when his personal honor is involved (executing Karstark and marrying Jeyne) but when it comes to Sansa he won’t even lift a finger. Therefore Catelyn was right in releasing Jaime.

I mean he is capable of going against the wishes of his lords when his personal honor is involved (executing Karstark and marrying Jeyne) but when it comes to Sansa he won’t even lift a finger. Therefore Catelyn was right in releasing Jaime.

blog.name: jackoshadows
blog.title: Jak O' the Shadows
blog.description: I’m not going to swear an oath I can’t uphold. Talk about my father if you want. Tell me that’s the attitude that got him killed. But when enough people make false promises, words stop meaning anything. Then there are no more answers - only better and better lies. And lies won’t help us in this fight - Jon Snow.

summary: Like, how many different ways can you analyze a forehead kiss?  Aren’t you guys bored yet? I know I am, scrolling through the...
body:
Like, how many different ways can you analyze a forehead kiss?

Aren’t you guys bored yet? I know I am, scrolling through the Jon Snow tag and  seeing the Jon kissing Sansa’s forehead gif for the thousandth time. For three years! I guess it’s been a dry couple of years for Jonsa fans, but maybe give that forehead kissing gif a wee rest?

This hiatus has been never ending and we have been starved of new material for too long….

Like, how many different ways can you analyze a forehead kiss?

Aren’t you guys bored yet? I know I am, scrolling through the Jon Snow tag and  seeing the Jon kissing Sansa’s forehead gif for the thousandth time. For three years! I guess it’s been a dry couple of years for Jonsa fans, but maybe give that forehead kissing gif a wee rest?

This hiatus has been never ending and we have been starved of new material for too long….

blog.name: 0pheliaraine

blog.description: I write (primarily) Game of Thrones fan fiction including Petyr x Sansa, Tywin x Marge, Stannis x Sansa, Tywin x Sansa, among others.

summary:
Prompts needed
Alright. It's about time I got back into the writing groove, and I thought I'd start small. 
I'm looking for any...
body:
Prompts needed

Alright. It’s about time I got back into the writing groove, and I thought I’d start small.

I’m looking for any of the following to whet my appetite.

  • Quote or word
  • Short dialogue / exchange
  • A scene (The story could already been unfolding. Could be the beginning, could be approaching a climax, could be a quiet moment.)

Main characters I’ll play with: Petyr, Sansa, Margaery, Tywin, although who knows! I might throw in others.

I’m not planning to write a full blown fic, but perhaps a page or two’s worth as a Tumblr post. No promises for using your prompt as I’m pretty time-poor lately, but I’ll try my best.

Could you also be a doll and spread the word, please? xx

summary: ok i feel lost, what is the jonsa(?) kidnap plot?? i'm confused
question: ok i feel lost, what is the jonsa(?) kidnap plot?? i'm confused
answer:
[This post contains spoilers]

Basically Kit and Lena filmed together in the place they shoot KL scenes and Sophie was reportedly there at the same time. @mygoodqueensansa said a Redditor saw a trailer that accidentally showed early and Sansa was bloodied in the trailer. There were other leaks like the guy who saw the VFX team putting a dragon in KL, there was a large fire in the KL set, the green screen mount for the dragons when Emilia climbs them was seen I think in the KL set, the recent ish spoiler in which Jorah, Jon and Tyrion walk through a destroyed KL street and finally Sophie and her body double was seen in the dragon pit set. From this we’ve been speculating that Sansa would be kidnapped and Jon comes to KL to help but I’m hoping he goes there to fight Dany. @thegratefulned was the first person who speculated that this could happen
